title: Watch Alcaraz's four hot shots from Rotterdam SFs
description: Saturday's action at the ABN AMRO Open saw Carlos Alcaraz produce electrifying tennis against Hubert Hurkacz in an exciting semi-final clash. From a tweener to thunderous forehands, the Spaniard had a few tricks in his bag to outlast the Pole. Watch the finest hot shots of the day from the No. 3 in PIF ATP Rankings below: [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Watch the best hot shots from Carlos Alcaraz at the ABN AMRO Open semi-finals on Saturday.

html:
Alyssa van Heyst Photography 2025

Carlos Alcaraz in action against Hubert Hurkacz at the ABN AMRO Open on Saturday. By ATP Staff

Saturday's action at the ABN AMRO Open saw Carlos Alcaraz produce electrifying tennis against Hubert Hurkacz in an exciting semi-final clash. From a tweener to thunderous forehands, the Spaniard had a few tricks in his bag to outlast the Pole.

Watch the finest hot shots of the day from the No. 3 in PIF ATP Rankings below:
